00048         public static bool IsIEnumerable(Type ObjectType)
00049         {
00050             try
00051             {
00052                 if (ObjectType.IsPrimitive)
00053                     return false;
00054                 if (ObjectType.GetConstructor(System.Type.EmptyTypes) != null)
00055                 {
00056                     object TempObject = Activator.CreateInstance(ObjectType);
00057                     if (TempObject is IEnumerable)
00058                         return true;
00059                 }
00060                 return false;
00061             }
00062             catch { throw; }
00063         }

00071         public static string DumpProperties(object Object)
00072         {
00073             try
00074             {
00075                 StringBuilder TempValue = new StringBuilder();
00076                 TempValue.Append("<table><thead><tr><th>Property Name</th><th>Property Value</th></tr></thead><tbody>");
00077                 Type ObjectType = Object.GetType();
00078                 PropertyInfo[] Properties = ObjectType.GetProperties();
00079                 foreach (PropertyInfo Property in Properties)
00080                 {
00081                     TempValue.Append("<tr><td>" + Property.Name + "</td><td>");
00082                     ParameterInfo[] Parameters = Property.GetIndexParameters();
00083                     if (Property.CanRead && Parameters.Length == 0)
00084                     {
00085                         try
00086                         {
00087                             object Value = Property.GetValue(Object, null);
00088                             TempValue.Append(Value == null ? "null" : Value.ToString());
00089                         }
00090                         catch { }
00091                     }
00092                     TempValue.Append("</td></tr>");
00093                 }
00094                 TempValue.Append("</tbody></table>");
00095                 return TempValue.ToString();
00096             }
00097             catch (Exception e)
00098             {
00099                 return e.ToString();
00100             }
00101         }
00102 
00109         public static string DumpProperties(Type ObjectType)
00110         {
00111             try
00112             {
00113                 StringBuilder TempValue = new StringBuilder();
00114                 TempValue.Append("<table><thead><tr><th>Property Name</th><th>Property Value</th></tr></thead><tbody>");
00115                 PropertyInfo[] Properties = ObjectType.GetProperties();
00116                 foreach (PropertyInfo Property in Properties)
00117                 {
00118                     TempValue.Append("<tr><td>" + Property.Name + "</td><td>");
00119                     if (Property.GetIndexParameters().Length == 0)
00120                     {
00121                         try
00122                         {
00123                             TempValue.Append(Property.GetValue(null, null) == null ? "null" : Property.GetValue(null, null).ToString());
00124                         }
00125                         catch { }
00126                     }
00127                     TempValue.Append("</td></tr>");
00128                 }
00129                 TempValue.Append("</tbody></table>");
00130                 return TempValue.ToString();
00131             }
00132             catch (Exception e)
00133             {
00134                 return e.ToString();
00135             }
00136         }

00142         public static string DumpAllAssembliesAndProperties()
00143         {
00144             try
00145             {
00146                 StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00147                 Assembly[] Assemblies = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies();
00148                 foreach (Assembly Assembly in Assemblies)
00149                 {
00150                     Builder.Append("<strong>" + Assembly.GetName().Name + "</strong><br />");
00151                     Builder.Append(DumpProperties(Assembly) + "<br /><br />");
00152                 }
00153                 return Builder.ToString();
00154             }
00155             catch { throw; }
00156         }

00163         public static System.Reflection.Assembly GetLoadedAssembly(string Name)
00164         {
00165             try
00166             {
00167                 foreach (Assembly TempAssembly in AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies())
00168                 {
00169                     if (TempAssembly.GetName().Name.Equals(Name, StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))
00170                     {
00171                         return TempAssembly;
00172                     }
00173                 }
00174                 return null;
00175             }
00176             catch { throw; }
00177         }

00185         public static object MakeShallowCopy(object Object, bool SimpleTypesOnly)
00186         {
00187             try
00188             {
00189                 Type ObjectType = Object.GetType();
00190                 PropertyInfo[] Properties = ObjectType.GetProperties();
00191                 FieldInfo[] Fields = ObjectType.GetFields();
00192                 object ClassInstance = Activator.CreateInstance(ObjectType);
00193 
00194                 foreach (PropertyInfo Property in Properties)
00195                 {
00196                     try
00197                     {
00198                         if (SimpleTypesOnly)
00199                         {
00200                             SetPropertyifSimpleType(Property, ClassInstance, Object);
00201                         }
00202                         else
00203                         {
00204                             SetProperty(Property, ClassInstance, Object);
00205                         }
00206                     }
00207                     catch { }
00208                 }
00209 
00210                 foreach (FieldInfo Field in Fields)
00211                 {
00212                     try
00213                     {
00214                         if (SimpleTypesOnly)
00215                         {
00216                             SetFieldifSimpleType(Field, ClassInstance, Object);
00217                         }
00218                         else
00219                         {
00220                             SetField(Field, ClassInstance, Object);
00221                         }
00222                     }
00223                     catch { }
00224                 }
00225 
00226                 return ClassInstance;
00227             }
00228             catch { throw; }
00229         }
00230 
00238         public static object MakeShallowCopyInheritedClass(Type DerivedType, object Object, bool SimpleTypesOnly)
00239         {
00240             try
00241             {
00242                 Type ObjectType = Object.GetType();
00243                 Type ReturnedObjectType = DerivedType;
00244                 PropertyInfo[] Properties = ObjectType.GetProperties();
00245                 FieldInfo[] Fields = ObjectType.GetFields();
00246                 object ClassInstance = Activator.CreateInstance(ReturnedObjectType);
00247 
00248                 foreach (PropertyInfo Property in Properties)
00249                 {
00250                     try
00251                     {
00252                         PropertyInfo ChildProperty = ReturnedObjectType.GetProperty(Property.Name);
00253                         if (ChildProperty != null)
00254                         {
00255                             if (SimpleTypesOnly)
00256                             {
00257                                 SetPropertyifSimpleType(ChildProperty, Property, ClassInstance, Object);
00258                             }
00259                             else
00260                             {
00261                                 SetProperty(ChildProperty, Property, ClassInstance, Object);
00262                             }
00263                         }
00264                     }
00265                     catch { }
00266                 }
00267 
00268                 foreach (FieldInfo Field in Fields)
00269                 {
00270                     try
00271                     {
00272                         FieldInfo ChildField = ReturnedObjectType.GetField(Field.Name);
00273                         if (ChildField != null)
00274                         {
00275                             if (SimpleTypesOnly)
00276                             {
00277                                 SetFieldifSimpleType(ChildField, Field, ClassInstance, Object);
00278                             }
00279                             else
00280                             {
00281                                 SetField(ChildField, Field, ClassInstance, Object);
00282                             }
00283                         }
00284                     }
00285                     catch { }
00286                 }
00287 
00288                 return ClassInstance;
00289             }
00290             catch { throw; }
00291         }

00299         public static System.Collections.Generic.List<Type> GetTypes(Assembly Assembly, string Interface)
00300         {
00301             try
00302             {
00303                 System.Collections.Generic.List<Type> ReturnList = new System.Collections.Generic.List<Type>();
00304                 if (Assembly != null)
00305                 {
00306                     Type[] Types = Assembly.GetTypes();
00307                     foreach (Type Type in Types)
00308                     {
00309                         if (Type.GetInterface(Interface, true) != null)
00310                         {
00311                             ReturnList.Add(Type);
00312                         }
00313                         else if (Type.BaseType != null && Type.BaseType.FullName != null && Type.BaseType.FullName.StartsWith(Interface))
00314                         {
00315                             ReturnList.Add(Type);
00316                         }
00317                     }
00318                 }
00319                 return ReturnList;
00320             }
00321             catch { throw; }
00322         }

00348         public static ListMapping<Assembly, Type> GetTypesFromDirectory(string AssemblyDirectory, string Interface, bool Recursive = false)
00349         {
00350             try
00351             {
00352                 ListMapping<Assembly, Type> ReturnList = new ListMapping<Assembly, Type>();
00353                 System.Collections.Generic.List<Assembly> Assemblies = GetAssembliesFromDirectory(AssemblyDirectory, Recursive);
00354                 foreach (Assembly Assembly in Assemblies)
00355                 {
00356                     Type[] Types = Assembly.GetTypes();
00357                     foreach (Type Type in Types)
00358                     {
00359                         if (Type.GetInterface(Interface, true) != null)
00360                         {
00361                             ReturnList.Add(Assembly, Type);
00362                         }
00363                     }
00364                 }
00365                 return ReturnList;
00366             }
00367             catch { throw; }
00368         }

00376         public static System.Collections.Generic.List<Assembly> GetAssembliesFromDirectory(string Directory,bool Recursive=false)
00377         {
00378             try
00379             {
00380                 System.Collections.Generic.List<Assembly> ReturnList = new System.Collections.Generic.List<Assembly>();
00381                 System.Collections.Generic.List<FileInfo> Files = FileManager.FileList(Directory, Recursive);
00382                 foreach (FileInfo File in Files)
00383                 {
00384                     if (File.Extension.Equals(".dll", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00385                     {
00386                         ReturnList.Add(Assembly.LoadFile(File.FullName));
00387                     }
00388                 }
00389                 return ReturnList;
00390             }
00391             catch { throw; }
00392         }

00401         public static object CallMethod(string MethodName, object Object,params object[] InputVariables)
00402         {
00403             try
00404             {
00405                 if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(MethodName) || Object == null)
00406                     return null;
00407                 Type ObjectType = Object.GetType();
00408                 MethodInfo Method = null;
00409                 if (InputVariables != null)
00410                 {
00411                     Type[] MethodInputTypes = new Type[InputVariables.Length];
00412                     for (int x = 0; x < InputVariables.Length; ++x)
00413                     {
00414                         MethodInputTypes[x] = InputVariables[x].GetType();
00415                     }
00416                     Method = ObjectType.GetMethod(MethodName, MethodInputTypes);
00417                     if (Method != null)
00418                     {
00419                         return Method.Invoke(Object, InputVariables);
00420                     }
00421                 }
00422                 Method = ObjectType.GetMethod(MethodName);
00423                 if (Method != null)
00424                 {
00425                     return Method.Invoke(Object, null);
00426                 }
00427                 return null;
00428             }
00429             catch { throw; }
00430         }

00439         public static void SetValue(object SourceValue, object DestinationObject,
00440             PropertyInfo DestinationPropertyInfo, string Format)
00441         {
00442             try
00443             {
00444                 if (DestinationObject == null || DestinationPropertyInfo == null)
00445                     return;
00446                 Type DestinationPropertyType = DestinationPropertyInfo.PropertyType;
00447                 DestinationPropertyInfo.SetValue(DestinationObject,
00448                     Parse(SourceValue, DestinationPropertyType, Format),
00449                     null);
00450             }
00451             catch { throw; }
00452         }
00453 
00464         public static void SetValue(object SourceValue, object DestinationObject, 
00465             string PropertyPath, string Format)
00466         {
00467             try
00468             {
00469                 string[] Splitter = { "." };
00470                 string[] DestinationProperties = PropertyPath.Split(Splitter, StringSplitOptions.None);
00471                 object TempDestinationProperty = DestinationObject;
00472                 Type DestinationPropertyType = DestinationObject.GetType();
00473                 PropertyInfo DestinationProperty = null;
00474                 for (int x = 0; x < DestinationProperties.Length - 1; ++x)
00475                 {
00476                     DestinationProperty = DestinationPropertyType.GetProperty(DestinationProperties[x]);
00477                     DestinationPropertyType = DestinationProperty.PropertyType;
00478                     TempDestinationProperty = DestinationProperty.GetValue(TempDestinationProperty, null);
00479                     if (TempDestinationProperty == null)
00480                         return;
00481                 }
00482                 DestinationProperty = DestinationPropertyType.GetProperty(DestinationProperties[DestinationProperties.Length - 1]);
00483                 SetValue(SourceValue, TempDestinationProperty, DestinationProperty, Format);
00484             }
00485             catch { throw; }
00486         }

00494         public static string GetPropertyName<T>(Expression<Func<T, object>> Expression)
00495         {
00496             try
00497             {
00498                 if (Expression == null)
00499                     return "";
00500                 string Name = "";
00501                 if (Expression.Body.NodeType == ExpressionType.Convert)
00502                 {
00503                     Name = Expression.Body.ToString().Replace("Convert(", "").Replace(")", "");
00504                     Name = Name.Remove(0, Name.IndexOf(".") + 1);
00505                 }
00506                 else
00507                 {
00508                     Name = Expression.Body.ToString();
00509                     Name = Name.Remove(0, Name.IndexOf(".") + 1);
00510                 }
00511                 return Name;
00512             }
00513             catch { throw; }
00514         }
00515 
00525         public static object GetPropertyValue(object SourceObject, string PropertyPath)
00526         {
00527             try
00528             {
00529                 if (SourceObject == null || string.IsNullOrEmpty(PropertyPath))
00530                     return null;
00531                 string[] Splitter = { "." };
00532                 string[] SourceProperties = PropertyPath.Split(Splitter, StringSplitOptions.None);
00533                 object TempSourceProperty = SourceObject;
00534                 Type PropertyType = SourceObject.GetType();
00535                 for (int x = 0; x < SourceProperties.Length; ++x)
00536                 {
00537                     PropertyInfo SourcePropertyInfo = PropertyType.GetProperty(SourceProperties[x]);
00538                     if (SourcePropertyInfo == null)
00539                         return null;
00540                     TempSourceProperty = SourcePropertyInfo.GetValue(TempSourceProperty, null);
00541                     if (TempSourceProperty == null)
00542                         return null;
00543                     PropertyType = SourcePropertyInfo.PropertyType;
00544                 }
00545                 return TempSourceProperty;
00546             }
00547             catch { throw; }
00548         }
00549 
00558         public static Type GetPropertyType(object SourceObject, string PropertyPath)
00559         {
00560             try
00561             {
00562                 if (SourceObject == null || string.IsNullOrEmpty(PropertyPath))
00563                     return null;
00564                 string[] Splitter = { "." };
00565                 string[] SourceProperties = PropertyPath.Split(Splitter, StringSplitOptions.None);
00566                 object TempSourceProperty = SourceObject;
00567                 Type PropertyType = SourceObject.GetType();
00568                 PropertyInfo PropertyInfo = null;
00569                 for (int x = 0; x < SourceProperties.Length; ++x)
00570                 {
00571                     PropertyInfo = PropertyType.GetProperty(SourceProperties[x]);
00572                     PropertyType = PropertyInfo.PropertyType;
00573                 }
00574                 return PropertyType;
00575             }
00576             catch { throw; }
00577         }

00587         public static Type GetPropertyType<T>(string PropertyPath)
00588         {
00589             try
00590             {
00591                 if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(PropertyPath))
00592                     return null;
00593                 Type ObjectType = typeof(T);
00594                 object Object = ObjectType.Assembly.CreateInstance(ObjectType.FullName);
00595                 return GetPropertyType(Object, PropertyPath);
00596             }
00597             catch { throw; }
00598         }

00609         public static object GetPropertyParent(object SourceObject, string PropertyPath, out PropertyInfo PropertyInfo)
00610         {
00611             try
00612             {
00613                 if (SourceObject == null)
00614                 {
00615                     PropertyInfo = null;
00616                     return null;
00617                 }
00618                 string[] Splitter = { "." };
00619                 string[] SourceProperties = PropertyPath.Split(Splitter, StringSplitOptions.None);
00620                 object TempSourceProperty = SourceObject;
00621                 Type PropertyType = SourceObject.GetType();
00622                 PropertyInfo = PropertyType.GetProperty(SourceProperties[0]);
00623                 PropertyType = PropertyInfo.PropertyType;
00624                 for (int x = 1; x < SourceProperties.Length; ++x)
00625                 {
00626                     if (TempSourceProperty != null)
00627                     {
00628                         TempSourceProperty = PropertyInfo.GetValue(TempSourceProperty, null);
00629                     }
00630                     PropertyInfo = PropertyType.GetProperty(SourceProperties[x]);
00631                     PropertyType = PropertyInfo.PropertyType;
00632                 }
00633                 return TempSourceProperty;
00634             }
00635             catch { throw; }
00636         }

00638         public static PropertyInfo GetProperty<Source>(string PropertyPath)
00639         {
00640             try
00641             {
00642                 if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(PropertyPath))
00643                     return null;
00644                 string[] Splitter = { "." };
00645                 string[] SourceProperties = PropertyPath.Split(Splitter, StringSplitOptions.None);
00646                 Type PropertyType = typeof(Source);
00647                 PropertyInfo PropertyInfo = PropertyType.GetProperty(SourceProperties[0]);
00648                 PropertyType = PropertyInfo.PropertyType;
00649                 for (int x = 1; x < SourceProperties.Length; ++x)
00650                 {
00651                     PropertyInfo = PropertyType.GetProperty(SourceProperties[x]);
00652                     PropertyType = PropertyInfo.PropertyType;
00653                 }
00654                 return PropertyInfo;
00655             }
00656             catch { throw; }
00657         }

00700         private static void SetField(FieldInfo ChildField, FieldInfo Field, object ClassInstance, object Object)
00701         {
00702             try
00703             {
00704                 if (Field.IsPublic && ChildField.IsPublic)
00705                 {
00706                     ChildField.SetValue(ClassInstance, Field.GetValue(Object));
00707                 }
00708             }
00709             catch { }
00710         }
00711 
00719         private static void SetFieldifSimpleType(FieldInfo ChildField, FieldInfo Field, object ClassInstance, object Object)
00720         {
00721             try
00722             {
00723                 Type FieldType = Field.FieldType;
00724                 if (Field.FieldType.FullName.StartsWith("System.Collections.Generic.List", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00725                 {
00726                     FieldType = Field.FieldType.GetGenericArguments()[0];
00727                 }
00728 
00729                 if (FieldType.FullName.StartsWith("System"))
00730                 {
00731                     SetField(ChildField, Field, ClassInstance, Object);
00732                 }
00733             }
00734             catch { throw; }
00735         }

00774         private static void SetProperty(PropertyInfo ChildProperty, PropertyInfo Property, object ClassInstance, object Object)
00775         {
00776             try
00777             {
00778                 if (ChildProperty.GetSetMethod() != null && Property.GetGetMethod() != null)
00779                 {
00780                     ChildProperty.SetValue(ClassInstance, Property.GetValue(Object, null), null);
00781                 }
00782             }
00783             catch { }
00784         }

00800                     PropertyType = Property.PropertyType.GetGenericArguments()[0];

00802

00804                 {

00818         internal static object Parse(object Input, Type OutputType)

00821             {
00822                 return Parse(Input, OutputType, "");
00823             }
00824             catch { throw; }

00833         private static object Parse(string Input, Type OutputType)
00834         {
00835             try
00836             {
00837                 if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(Input))
00838                     return null;
00839                 return Parse(Input, OutputType, "");
00840             }
00841             catch { throw; }
00842         }
00843 
00852         private static object Parse(object Input, Type OutputType,string Format)
00853         {
00854             try
00855             {
00856                 if (Input==null || OutputType == null)
00857                     return null;
00858                 Type InputType = Input.GetType();
00859                 if (InputType == OutputType)
00860                 {
00861                     return Input;
00862                 }
00863                 else if (OutputType == typeof(string))
00864                 {
00865                     return StringHelper.FormatToString(Input, Format);
00866                 }
00867                 else
00868                 {
00869                     return CallMethod("Parse", OutputType.Assembly.CreateInstance(OutputType.FullName), StringHelper.FormatToString(Input, DiscoverFormatString(InputType, OutputType, Format)));
00870                 }
00871             }
00872             catch { throw; }
00873         }
00874 
00882         private static string DiscoverFormatString(Type InputType,
00883             Type OutputType,string FormatString)
00884         {
00885             try
00886             {
00887                 if (InputType == OutputType
00888                     || InputType == typeof(string)
00889                     || OutputType == typeof(string))
00890                     return FormatString;
00891                 if (InputType == typeof(float)
00892                     || InputType == typeof(double)
00893                     || InputType == typeof(decimal)
00894                     || OutputType == typeof(float)
00895                     || OutputType == typeof(double)
00896                     || OutputType == typeof(decimal))
00897                     return "f0";
00898                 return FormatString;
00899             }
00900             catch { throw; }
00901         }

00903     }
